EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Greenplum Summit_NYC_Q119.GP Summit - 12/12/18
EmailTemplate.subject: Save the Date for Greenplum Summit at PostgresConf 2019
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://postgresconf.org/conferences/2019]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, Save the date for our second annual Greenplum Summit, an event dedicated to Greenplum Database <[[https://greenplum.org/]]>, the Massively Parallel Postgres Data Platform, at PostgresConf 2019 <[[https://postgresconf.org/conferences/2019]]>. It’s all happening March 18-22 in New York City, and we want you to be part of it! At Greenplum Summit you will:
- Learn about our AI and analytics contributions to Greenplum and Postgres
- Examine advanced customer case studies
- Develop new skills through in-depth Greenplum tutorials
- Share emerging best practices in Postgres-based data analytics
- Envision the future of Greenplum and Postgres while networking with your peers
Get a 25% discount on PostgresConf registration <[[https://postgresconf.org/conferences/2019/buytickets]]> with promo code “2019_GREENPLUM <[[https://postgresconf.org/conferences/2019/buytickets]]>”. Greenplum Users: Share Your Story! The Call for Papers is open now! Share your story <[[https://postgresconf.org/conferences/2019#callforpapers]]> and get a free full conference pass to attend Greenplum Summit and PostegresConf 2019. Our Greenplum Summit 2018 Sessions Get a taste of Greenplum Summit by checking out some of our sessions and highlighted content <[[https://content.pivotal.io/greenplum-summit-at-postgresconf-us-2018]]> from the 2018 event. Stay connected Join the conversation on Twitter! Follow @PivotalData <[[https://twitter.com/PivotalData]]> and @Greenplum <[[https://twitter.com/Greenplum]]> and #ScaleMatters <[[https://twitter.com/search?src=typd&q=%23ScaleMatters]]> for all the news and updates.
I hope to see you there, Jacque, Head of Data @ Pivotal
